document_data.name: Black Claw Mercantile Company
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Claw Mercantile Company''' was a fellowship run mainly by [[House Baenre]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Organization: The fellowship was one of two competing merchant houses in Menzoberranzan.  It existed primarily to trade goods between Menzoberranzan and [[House Zauvirr]] in [[Ched Nasad]], and was based upon a trade agreement.<ref>
